{{Actor| | type = SFX | name = Blue teleporter glitter spark | class = TeleGlitter2 | game = Heretic }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:TeleGlitter1|TeleGlitter1]]→TeleGlitter2
A blue variant of the [[Classes:TeleGlitter1|red glitter]], created by a [[Classes:TeleGlitterGenerator2|blue glitter generator]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR TeleGlitter2 : {{Class|TeleGlitter1}} { States { Spawn: TGLT F 2 Bright TGLT G 2 Bright [[A_AccTeleGlitter]] TGLT H 2 Bright TGLT I 2 Bright [[A_AccTeleGlitter]] TGLT J 2 Bright Loop } }
